document.full_text: six people have been charged with running a pair of seattle-area shoplifting rings that stole an estimated $6 million in merchandise and resold it elsewhere, prosecutors said on thursday.
document.title: six accused of running seattle-area shoplifting rings
lines_and_colors: six people have been charged with running a pair of seattle-area shoplifting rings that stole an estimated $6 million in merchandise and resold it elsewhere, prosecutors said on thursday.
